_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Impermanence of the aggregates [sn25.10:: Form is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
Feeling is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
Perception is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
Choices are impermanent, perishing, and changing.
Consciousness is impermanent, perishing, and changing.
Characteristics of the three types of fo: Arrived at inevitability regarding the right path
Arrived at the level of the good person
Transcended the level of the bad person
Can't do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm
Can't die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
